title: Sex and your job search - Dominic Bokich - EPUB - Mr Festus
description:
Sex and Your Job Search: A Guide to Scoring Your Dream Job by Dominic Bokich
 2013 | EPUB | 879.37KB
 

SCORE YOUR DREAM JOB! In this provocative book, interview coach Dom Bokich compares the similarities between dating, sex and the job search to help you find a job you love! This book takes you step-by-step through the hiring process and shares real insider secrets on how to get hired quickly in today's job market. You'll learn:
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢25 inspiring Success Stories of job seekers who were hired in this economy 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Advice on social media tools such as LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Current interview methods including behavioral based and values based interviewing
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢50 Funny Mistakes real applicants have made, so you won't embarrass yourself 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢How to write a resume and become irresistible to your dream employer 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢How supermodels are similar to hiring managers and HR reps
 
Sex and Your Job Search is encouraging and highlights proven techniques for everyone: interns, college students, new grads, and experienced professionals.

Bonus tips include: How to use your skills, education, and professional experiences to create 7 "Interview Go-to Stories" that can be used to answer any interview question. Learn what the interviewer is thinking each step of the way and how to "WOW" them.

This book is like having coffee or a drink with the author. He'll give you no-nonsense advice that works!
